title: Enhancing System Design Practical Competencies: Online Case-Based TPACK for Pre-Service Language Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Through online case analysis, learners can identify real-world applications of Technological Pedagogical Content Knowledge (TPACK) with over 80% accuracy
Learners can design three or more technology-pedagogy-content integration scenarios specialized for language education
Learners can present the interaction of TPACK elements with over 70% participation in peer feedback-based PBL activities

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
